Class Radiation

Prop
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.Punishment
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.Radiation
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
public class Radiation extends Punishment
Represents a radiation-based punishment that uses a shared static countdown timer across all radiation tiles. The countdown ticks globally, ensuring that walking across multiple radiation tiles does not reset the timer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Radiation()
    Constructs a new Radiation punishment instance using the "radiation" sprite.

    • getPunishmentType

      public PunishmentType getPunishmentType()
      Returns the punishment type associated with radiation.
      Specified by:
      getPunishmentType in class Punishment
      Returns:
      PunishmentType.RADIATION

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the radiation state each tick. Ensures the static ticker is attached to the game loop exactly once and manages the shared countdown behavior.
      Specified by:
      update in class Punishment

    • getCountdownMax

      public static int getCountdownMax()
      Returns the maximum countdown duration.
      Returns:
      the maximum countdown value

    • startCountdown

      public static void startCountdown()
      Starts the global radiation countdown.

    • stopCountdown

      public static void stopCountdown()
      Stops the global radiation countdown and resets behavior.

    • isCountdownStarted

      public static boolean isCountdownStarted()
      Indicates whether the countdown is currently active.
      Returns:
      true if the countdown is running, false otherwise

    • getCountdownTimer

      public static int getCountdownTimer()
      Returns the current value of the shared countdown timer.
      Returns:
      the remaining countdown time
